vsParam:
Ah, Cresson... and all other guards.
It seems noisy there. What's happening?

Oh, it's [px] and you. A massive space-time distortion
showed up in front of Ruhuna Village.

Monsters may come out of it.
We're warning people to stay away from it.

You guys should stay away from it too as it's too risky.
But...

There is a strange girl near it.
She refuses to leave.

A girl? Who is she?
[px], anyway, let's go there to have a look?

Wait wait, I told you to stay away from there,
it's too risky!? I'm worried about that girl too...

Haha, no worries! [px] will take care of it
even if any accident happens ♪

Yeah, Sorel is right!
Isn't she, [px]?

Haha, it seems I can't stop you...
Alright. I'll go with you if you insist!

OK, deal!
Oh, right, can we take some snacks with us?
Hey, let me get this straight, we're not going for there fun...

I'm going to let you take care of the "Ambrosia Flower"
which represents "Fire" and "Wind".

Your parents protected this flower for 500 years.
Now it's your turn.
Ly... Lycoris! What's that attitude about?!

Hee hee, sis, no need to get too nervous.
It's no big deal to keep a flower!

Hehe, really?
Lycoris, transfer a bit of your energy to this flower.

But, make sure to keep this in mind.
Never, never let the "Ambrosia Flower" perish.

If this flower perishes...
the "Fairyland of Flowers" will perish too.

It's significant to take care of and keep the "Ambrosia Flower".
Don't take it as a normal flower.

Plus, the Ambrosia Flower comes with strong magic power.
So monsters tend to attack it, do you know that?

Make sure to always stay sharp.
Radiata, Lycoris.

Got... Got it, uncle!
We promise we'll keep it alive with great care!

OK! Thank you then. Your target is to
cultivate permanent nutrient soil in 500 years.

With the permanent nutrient soil, you can
pass your job onto next generation. Understood?
Lycoris, let's take our time to find the flower fertilizer!

OK, sis!
Oh, right, can I bring snacks with me?
Yeah, sure! Bring as many as you can!

Yeah~ It's such a good day, Lycoris!
Let's get deeper into it today?

Ah, sis! Maybe this could be used as fertilizer!
Let's get some back! Oh, there is some over there too!

Ah, wait for me, Lycoris!
Don't stay too far away from me!

Lycoris? Gosh, where is she?
Lycoris, Lycoris!!

Uh, it's odd? What's going on...
I... I feel sleepy suddenly...
